name: kit kat cookie bars

ingredients.amount: enough to cover bottom of pan

directions: preheat the oven to 350â„‰. line a 9x13 pan with parchment paper.
chop the kit kat roughly and press into the base of the baking pan.
in a bowl, mix melted butter, brown sugar, and granulated sugar.
add eggs and vanilla and mix well.
in a separate bowl, whisk flour, baking soda, and salt.
add the dry mixture to the wet and mix until some streaks remain.
add chopped kit kat and mix until no flour is visible.
spread the cookie dough evenly over the base.
top with more kit kat pieces if desired.
bake for 25-30 minutes until edges are light golden.
